mapper.select: SELECT sfs.`name` AS NAME, sfs.`description`, sfs.`front_logo` AS frontLogo, sfs.`gift_capsule_addr` AS giftCapsuleAddr, sfs.`home_generalize_addr` AS homeGeneralizeAddr, sfs.`coupon_centre_addr` AS couponCentreAddr, sfs.`store_generalize_addr` AS storeGeneralizeAddr, sfs.`default_picture` AS defaultPicture, sfs.head_color AS headColor, sfs.good_label_smallsoft AS goodLabelSmallsoft, sfs.good_label_app AS goodLabelApp FROM sys_front_setting sfs WHERE sfs.`del_flag` = 0
